section.title: Introduction
section.para: This code is the deliverable 7.2 of the BioPreDyn project ("Prototype Software for Testing: User-friendly version of prototype software for testing in a setting for industrial applications").
For more information about the development tasks related to the BioPreDyn project (and the content of the deliverable 7.2), please visit the developer's wiki.
For more information about the BioPreDyn project itself, please refer to the official project website .
